des:
With Allen+Roth Motorized Shade APP skill for Amazon Alexa, you can interact with your motorized shades just with your voice. Open and Close the shade or to stop your shade to the desired position in responses to your daily practice. 

To get started pairing Alexa with shade to voice-activate, you will need a Allen + Roth gateway hub and sign up the Allen + Roth motorized shade app you download. If you don’t have a Allen + Roth hub, please visit Lowe’s store near you. 

Quick Guide : 
Log in Allen + Roth APP and visit the Me page. 
Press Services and select Amazon alexa to quick understand how to add Allen + Roth device to your Alexa APP. 
Once you’ve enabled this skill and log-in your Alexa account, you’ll be able to control your shades using just your voice.

Just say it …
- Alexa, close the device name. 
- Alexa, open the device name. 

** The “device name” is the name of the device in the device list of your Alexa APP.**
